author: Ann M. Simmons
title: Coronavirus Forces Putin to Delay Vote That Could Keep Him in Power - The Wall Street Journal
description: Coronavirus Forces Putin to Delay Vote That Could Keep Him in Power The Wall Street Journal Coronavirus deals blow to Putin's plans to stay in power until 2036 CNN Coronavirus delays Russian vote on Putin staying in power BBC News Putin Delays Referendum on P…
content: MOSCOWIn his first address to the nation since the outbreak of the coronavirus pandemic, Russian President Vladimir Putin told citizens that an April referendum on changes to the countrys constitution would be postponed to help curb the spread of the illness.… [+216 chars]
